original_title: 優しくこたえて　ＴＯＵＣＨ　ＭＥ　ＴＥＮＤＥＲＬＹ
overview: A scramble of love and friendship that unfolds painfully and refreshingly, mainly on a university campus. A vivid spectacle of youth runs at full speed towards the motorcycle race that takes place around the woman of your dreams!
title: Kindly Answer: Touch Me Tenderly
